thing-type.label: NZW30 In-Wall Switch
thing-type.description: In-Wall Switch<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtInovelli's In-Wall Smart Switch (On/Off) not only has the ability to turn on and off appliances, lights, and more from anywhere in the world, but it acts as a Z-Wave signal repeater, which amplifies your Z-Wave signal, growing the capabilities of your network.<br /&gt<br /&gtIn addition, it has scene control enabled, which allows you to double tap the switch to activate a Z-Wave scene. An example would be a bedtime scene, which turns off all lights, locks the door(s) and sets the temperature to 68 degrees.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gttriple press the Up/Down push button to include it in the network</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gttriple press the Up/Down push button to exclude it from the network.</p&gt
